name: HR - Employee Onboarding System with WhatsApp

parameters.subject: =Welcome to {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.company || 'TechCorp Solutions' }}! üéâ
parameters.message:
=

Welcome Aboard, {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.firstName }}!

We're thrilled to have you join our team as {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.position }} in the {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.department }} department.

Your First Day Details:

  • Start Date: {{ new Date($('Format Employee Data').item.json.startDate).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { weekday: 'long', year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' }) }}
  • Reporting Time: 9:00 AM
  • Location: Main Office, Reception Desk
  • Reporting Manager: {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.manager }}
  • Employee ID: {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeId }}

Temporary Login Credentials:

Email: {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.email }}

Temporary Password: {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.temporaryPassword }}

Please change your password on first login

What to Bring:

  • Government-issued ID
  • Bank account details for payroll
  • Emergency contact information
  • Any professional certificates (if applicable)

Your Onboarding Schedule:

Over the next few days, you'll receive:

  1. Day 1: This welcome email & account setup
  2. Day 3: Team introduction & resources
  3. Day 7: First week check-in & training schedule

Documents to Complete:

You'll receive a separate email with links to complete:

  • Employment Agreement
  • Tax Forms
  • Benefits Enrollment
  • Emergency Contacts
  • IT Equipment Agreement

If you have any questions before your start date, please don't hesitate to reach out to HR at hr@techcorp.com or your manager at {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.managerEmail }}.

We look forward to seeing you soon!

Best regards,
Human Resources Team
TechCorp Solutions

This is an automated message from the HR Onboarding System.

parameters.subject: =Day 3: Meet Your Team & Access Resources ü§ù
parameters.message:
=

Hello {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.firstName }},

As you prepare for your first day with us, we wanted to introduce you to your team and provide access to important resources.

Your Team Members:

Department: {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.department }}

Team Size: 8 members

Direct Manager: {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.manager }}

Team Meeting: Every Monday at 10:00 AM

Key Resources:

  • üìö Employee Handbook: Access Here
  • üíº Company Policies: View Policies
  • üéØ Department Goals: Current Quarter Goals
  • üìä Org Chart: View Structure
  • üõ†Ô∏è IT Setup Guide: Technical Setup

Communication Channels:

You'll be added to the following on your first day:

  • Email Groups: team@techcorp.com, all-hands@techcorp.com
  • Chat Channels: #general, #{{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.department.toLowerCase().replace(' ', '-') }}, #new-employees
  • Project Management: Access to project boards

Your Buddy:

We've assigned you an onboarding buddy to help you settle in:

Name: Sarah Johnson

Role: Senior {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.position }}

Email: sarah.johnson@techcorp.com

Sarah will reach out to you soon to introduce herself and answer any questions!

Looking forward to welcoming you to the team!

Warm regards,
{{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.manager }}
{{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.department }} Department

parameters.subject: =Week 1 Check-in & Training Schedule üìÖ
parameters.message:
=

Hi {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.firstName }},

Your first day is almost here! Here's your training schedule and important information for your first week.

üìÖ First Week Training Schedule:

Day Time Activity Location
Monday 9:00 AM - 12:00 PM HR Orientation & Paperwork HR Conference Room
Monday 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM IT Setup & Security Training IT Department
Tuesday 10:00 AM - 11:30 AM Department Overview Team Meeting Room
Wednesday 9:00 AM - 10:00 AM 1-on-1 with Manager Manager's Office
Thursday 2:00 PM - 3:30 PM Product/Service Training Training Room A
Friday 3:00 PM - 4:00 PM Week 1 Review & Q&A HR Conference Room

We're excited to have you join us!

Best wishes,
HR Team & {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.manager }}

parameters.subject: =Important: Complete Your Onboarding Documents üìù
parameters.message:
=

Hi {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.firstName }},

Please complete the following onboarding documents before your first day:

üìã Required Documents:

  1. Personal Information Form
    Complete Form
  2. Tax Information
    Complete Form
  3. Emergency Contact Details
    Complete Form
  4. Direct Deposit Information
    Complete Form
  5. IT Equipment Agreement
    Complete Form
  6. Confidentiality Agreement
    Complete Form

‚è∞ Deadline:

Please complete all forms by {{ new Date(Date.now() + 5 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { weekday: 'long', year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' }) }}

Thank you!

Best regards,
HR Department

assignments.value: Welcome orientation covering company overview, policies, benefits, and Q&A

parameters.subject: =üéâ Welcome Our New Team Member - {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.firstName }} {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.lastName }}
parameters.message:
=

Team, please welcome our newest member!

{{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.firstName }} {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.lastName }}

Position: {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.position }}

Department: {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.department }}

Start Date: {{ new Date($('Format Employee Data').item.json.startDate).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { weekday: 'long', year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' }) }}

Email: {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.email }}

Reports to: {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.manager }}

About {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.firstName }}:

{{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.bio || 'Will be joining us to strengthen our team and bring fresh perspectives to our projects.' }}

How You Can Help:

  • Send a welcome message
  • Invite them to team lunch on their first week
  • Share helpful resources and documentation
  • Be available for questions
  • Include them in relevant meetings and discussions

Let's all make {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.firstName }} feel welcome!

Best regards,
{{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.manager }}
{{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.department }} Department Head

parameters.responseBody:
={
  "success": true,
  "employeeId": "{{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeId }}",
  "message": "Employee onboarding process initiated successfully",
  "details": {
    "name": "{{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.firstName }} {{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.lastName }}",
    "position": "{{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.position }}",
    "department": "{{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.employeeData.department }}",
    "startDate": "{{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.startDate }}",
    "temporaryPassword": "{{ $('Format Employee Data').item.json.temporaryPassword }}",
    "onboardingTasks": [
      "Employee profile created in HRIS",
      "Welcome email sent",
      "WhatsApp notification sent",
      "Document forms sent",
      "Orientation meeting scheduled",
      "Manager meeting scheduled",
      "Team notification sent",
      "Onboarding tracker updated"
    ]
  }
}

parameters.content:
## HR Employee Onboarding Workflow v2

### Key Updates:
‚úÖ Replaced deprecated calendar nodes with Google Sheets
‚úÖ Added WhatsApp notifications via Green API
‚úÖ All services are 100% FREE
‚úÖ Complete meeting tracking system

### Services Used:
- **Google Sheets** - HRIS, Meeting Scheduler, Tracker
- **Gmail** - Email automation
- **Google Forms** - Document collection
- **Green API** - WhatsApp notifications

### Workflow Features:
1. Automated employee profile creation
2. Multi-day email sequence (Days 1, 3, 7)
3. WhatsApp notifications to employee & manager
4. Meeting scheduling & tracking
5. Document collection via forms
6. Team announcements
7. Complete onboarding progress tracking

### Required Sheets:
- Employee Database
- Meetings Schedule
- Onboarding Tracker

json.bio: Sana specializes in talent acquisition and employee engagement with 5 years of HR experience.
